AT0053.title: Malicious AI Applications
AT0053.description: The term 'malicious AI applications' describes practices that use artificial intelligence technology for malicious purposes or illegal activities. These technologies may be abused in violation of laws and ethical standards, causing potential harm. Related concepts include Deepfake technology for generating realistic fake content, fusion of malware with AI to evade detection, social engineering using natural language processing, AI-powered cyberattacks, automated large-scale network attacks, and AI-generated online fraud content.

references.title: Beware of AI Black Industry Chain Batch-Generating Defamatory Content
